title: Mahira Khan posts DDLJ-inspired video, says this is what she couldn’t do in Raees | bollywood | Hindustan Times
text:
Desimartini Mahira Khan posts DDLJ-inspired video, says this is what she couldn’t do in Raees 
Pakistani actor Mahira Khan, who worked with Shah Rukh Khan in Raees, has posted a video on Instagram in which she is dancing in mustard fields. bollywood Updated: Feb 21, 2017 16:46 IST Hindustan Times, New Delhi Mahira Khan played Shah Rukh Khan’s wife in Raees. 
Pakistani actor Mahira Khan couldn’t dance in mustard fields with Shah Rukh Khan in Raees, but that didn’t stop her from recreating the famous scene from Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge. She has posted a video on her Instagram account in which she is dancing in a field full of yellow flowers. A post shared by Mahira Khan (@mahirahkhan) on Feb 20, 2017 at 1:59am PST 
Mahira played Shah Rukh Khan’s wife in director Rahul Dholakia’s Raees. A post shared by Mahira Khan (@mahirahkhan) on Feb 2, 2017 at 4:59am PST 
A well known face on Pakistani TV, Mahira made her big Bollywood debut with Raees, but she was kept out of the promotional drive because of the protests Pakistani actors faced. 
She also expressed her regret over not being included in the film’s promotions. tags
